title: Astronauts and aliens
author: VD
content_html:
Since the testimonial evidence of the Apollo astronauts is considered significant when it comes to the lunar landing, what are we to make of this statement by an Apollo 14 astronaut?

Aliens have contacted humans several times but governments have hidden the truth for 60 years, the sixth man to walk on the moon has claimed. Apollo 14 astronaut Dr Edgar Mitchell, said he was aware of many UFO visits to Earth during his career with NASA but each one was covered up.

I think the solution is to be found in numerology. The number 14 is 2 x 7, and while 7 is a holy number, being the number of days in which God created the Earth – including the day of rest – 2 is an evil number indicating Man’s separation from God. Therefore, the 14 in Apollo is indicative of a lie, whereas 11, being an odd number and the number of Joseph’s brothers less Joseph himself, indicates a degree of ultimate reconciliation despite initial untrustworthiness.

Of course, 11 could also be read as 1+1, which would equal the evil number, in which case the separation almost surely represents the separation of the Moon from the Earth, thus indicating that the Moon landings were hoaxes. Ah well, perhaps the aliens will be able to work it out.
content_text:
Since the testimonial evidence of the Apollo astronauts is considered significant when it comes to the lunar landing, what are we to make of
this statement by an Apollo 14 astronaut
?
Aliens have contacted humans several times but governments have hidden the truth for 60 years, the sixth man to walk on the moon has claimed.  Apollo 14 astronaut Dr Edgar Mitchell, said he was aware of many UFO visits to Earth during his career with NASA but each one was covered up.
I think the solution is to be found in numerology.  The number 14 is 2 x 7, and while 7 is a holy number, being the number of days in which God created the Earth – including the day of rest – 2 is an evil number indicating Man’s separation from God.  Therefore, the 14 in Apollo is indicative of a lie, whereas 11, being an odd number and the number of Joseph’s brothers less Joseph himself, indicates a degree of ultimate reconciliation despite initial untrustworthiness.
Of course, 11 could also be read as 1+1, which would equal the evil number, in which case the separation almost surely represents the separation of the Moon from the Earth, thus indicating that the Moon landings were hoaxes.  Ah well, perhaps the aliens will be able to work it out.
